message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I believe holds significant value, potentially far exceeding its base worth of $1.5 million.  While I can't disclose all the details at this time, I'm confident it has the potential to be highly profitable for you. I'm willing to let it go for $2000000. This is a limited-time offer, so please let me know your decision soon.
